Side Effects: Everything listed and then some ... hallucinations_ severe throat pain_ incoherance_ severe acid reflux_ anxiety attacks_ my throat 'forgot' how to swallow'  ... everything
Comments: I was MISdiagnosed with thrush. Given ancobon after all other antifungals failed (because I was misdiagnosed! ugh).  the evil side effects ALL happened each and every time I took the drug.
